ars_scalaes.glyph_desc.glyph_expand: Make an entity grow in size. Unlike Resize, expansion is cumulative with multiple casts. Requires Pehkui.
ars_scalaes.glyph_desc.glyph_resize: Changes the size of a living entity. Amplify to grow, Dampen to shrink, do not augment to restore original size. Requires Pehkui.
ars_scalaes.glyph_desc.glyph_shrink: Shrinks an entity. Unlike Resize, shrinking is cumulative with multiple casts. Requires Pehkui.
ars_scalaes.glyph_desc.glyph_morph: Morphs into the entity hit. Use on self to break the morph. Requires Identity.
ars_scalaes.glyph_desc.glyph_soul_shatte: Shatter the enemy soul, damaging it with the chance of releasing the spirits inside.
tooltip.ars_scalaes.magebloom_brush: Might recharge itself with the mana of the rider
ars_scalaes.immersive_warp_scroll.desc: Warp Scrolls infused with source. It can be used to create immersive portals without the need of a source jar nearby if Immersive Portals is installed, but they can't be used to teleport directly or form classic portals.
power.ars_scalaes.source_loved.name: Blessing of the Source
power.ars_scalaes.source_loved.descripti: While at 2 hearts, your mana regeneration is quadrupled.
power.ars_scalaes.magic_boost.name: Mana Body
power.ars_scalaes.magic_boost.descriptio: Increases maximum mana and boost mana regeneration.
Increases the damage of your spells by 3 but reduce your physical attack by 20%%
power.ars_scalaes.source_addict.name: Source Addict
power.ars_scalaes.source_addict.descript: Saturation gained by non magical food is heavily reduced.
power.ars_scalaes.source_addict_2.name: Source Addict
power.ars_scalaes.source_addict_2.descri: Mana capacity is greatly increased but mana regeneration is lowered.
power.ars_scalaes.mana_absorber.name: Magic Absorber
power.ars_scalaes.mana_absorber.descript: Magical damage taken is halved and partially converted into mana.
power.ars_scalaes.book_inept.name: Book Inept
power.ars_scalaes.book_inept.description: You can't cast spells from spellbooks, but can use them to inscribe turrets and caster tools.
power.ars_scalaes.toggle_phase.name: Phase Shift
power.ars_scalaes.toggle_phase.descripti: Toggle to phase through soil and trees. Be one with the earth.
